F

FIRST_EQUAL_TO_SECOND - Static variable in interface com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core.ILPOrdering
The value returned by ILPOrdering.compare(Object, Object) if the first argument neither precedes nor succeeds the second argument in this ordering.
FIRST_GREATER_THAN_SECOND - Static variable in interface com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core.ILPOrdering
The value returned by ILPOrdering.compare(Object, Object) if the first argument succeeds the second argument in this ordering.
FIRST_LESS_THAN_SECOND - Static variable in interface com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core.ILPOrdering
The value returned by ILPOrdering.compare(Object, Object) if the first argument precedes the second argument in this ordering.
